properties.Observatio: Olugama community water project is operating using this spring and distributes water to 120 families. No water treatment plant has been built for water purification.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of Concrete water filtering tank of 6 cum - size internal  2mx2mx1.75m

Construction of the 6 cum concrete tank

Providing the filter media

connecting storage tank and filtering tank with necessary pipes and fittings

Miscellaneous 

Contin

properties.Observatio: It is a well functioning water project and there is a need for a 10,000 litters plastic water storage tank.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of 20 cum water storage tank

Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal t 3mx3mx2.5

Connecting the water tank to the existing system

Miscellaneous
